title: Christmann (Dr. Fr.)
body: German doctor who spent three winters in Madeira and conducted some meteorological studies here. Ref.: Funchal auf Madeira und seine Klima: Zabern. 1889.

Dr. Fr. Christmann: German doctor who conducted meteorological studies in Madeira

1889: Publication of the book 'Funchal auf Madeira und seine Klima' by Dr. Fr. Christmann
